experience.title: Product and Market Research
experience.description: • Gathered requirements for a personalized content recommender for children catering to their interests and development.• Formulated a quality improvement methodology of recommendations that ensures passive screen time reduction.• Identified business development opportunities through content marketing and affiliate marketing practices.• Appraised product ideas from competitor analysis and user feedback in the digital well-being and parenting markets.• Supported the developers' team during the product launch by identifying shortfalls in the parental control application.• Defined a framework for the in-app chatbot and created user stories to identify unaddressed pain points in parenting.
experience.description_html: • Gathered requirements for a personalized content recommender for children catering to their interests and development.• Formulated a quality improvement methodology of recommendations that ensures passive screen time reduction.• Identified business development opportunities through content marketing and affiliate marketing practices.• Appraised product ideas from competitor analysis and user feedback in the digital well-being and parenting markets.• Supported the developers' team during the product launch by identifying shortfalls in the parental control application.• Defined a framework for the in-app chatbot and created user stories to identify unaddressed pain points in parenting.

experience.title: Trainee
experience.description: Applications of Geospatial Technologies | Regional Remote Sensing-Central, NRSC, ISRO   • Performed a Change Analysis using ERDAS Imagine (Earth Resources Data Analysis System) of Landsat-8 data sets.   • Determined the percentage change in natural resources and settlement area to develop Qualitative Inferences.   • Applied Spatial Database Creation and Remote Sensing Data Handling methods for cleaning and georeferencing.• Digitized map components and performed Unsupervised Classification of resources on the specific areas of study.
experience.description_html: Applications of Geospatial Technologies | Regional Remote Sensing-Central, NRSC, ISRO • Performed a Change Analysis using ERDAS Imagine (Earth Resources Data Analysis System) of Landsat-8 data sets. • Determined the percentage change in natural resources and settlement area to develop Qualitative Inferences. • Applied Spatial Database Creation and Remote Sensing Data Handling methods for cleaning and georeferencing.• Digitized map components and performed Unsupervised Classification of resources on the specific areas of study.
